name: RelatedListItem

fields.name: customButtons
fields.description: A list of custom buttons used in the related list.

fields.name: excludeButtons
fields.description: A list of excluded related-list buttons.

fields.name: fields
fields.description: A list of fields displayed in the related list. Uses aliases instead of field or API names.

fields.name: relatedList
fields.description: The name of the related list.

fields.name: sortField
fields.description: The name of the field used for sorting.

fields.name: sortOrder
fields.description: When sortField is set, the sortOrder property determines the sort order.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.RelatedListItem.

description: Represents an item in the related list in a page layout.
